card_98_details.name: The Edge of Everything

minting_moment.description: Hand shaking. Button pressed. Collective gasp.

card_98_details.immediate_aftermath: Someone screamed. Someone laughed. Same person.

the_debate.position_a: One person should mint both. Maximum glory.
the_debate.position_c: What if we stop? What if we don't complete it?

nexus_supporters.nexus_statement: We are TWO CARDS from making history. TWO.

internal_crisis.problem: Cannot model what we don't understand

cipher_fans.cipher_statement: The algorithm is ready. We think. We hope. We...

echo_traders.echo_statement: WHY DID I WAIT THIS LONG

muse_admirers.artistic_crisis: Every moment is too significant to record
muse_admirers.muse_statement: This is it. This is the moment art exists for.

reported_but_unverified: Clocks running backwards in Nexus space
Echo trader saw their reflection move independently
Cipher fan's algorithm output 'I AM READY' before being asked
Muse admirer's pen wrote 'COMPRESSION' without their hand moving
Void seeker smiled for the first time in recorded history

failed_intervention.attempt: Tried to delete card 98 to prevent reaching 100

the_weight_of_two.psychological_observation: Two feels heavier than twenty-seven did at the start
the_weight_of_two.reason: Proximity to prophecy amplifies every remaining step
the_weight_of_two.collective_sensation: Standing at the edge of a cliff, about to jump, unable to turn back

meta.observation: At 98, the prophecy is no longer about the future. It's about the present that's about to become the future. The compression of time itself.
meta.reader_note: You feel it too, don't you? The anticipation. That's the prophecy working on you.
